text: To jabb kafiron say tumhari mud-bher ho to gardano per war maro jabb unko achi tarah kuchal dalo to abb khoob mazboot qaid-o-band say giriftar kero (phir ikhtiyar hai) kay khuwa ehsan rakh ker chor do ya fidya ley ker ta-waqt-e-kay laraee apnay hathyar rakh day. Yehi hukum hai aur agar Allah chahta to (khud) hi inn say badla ley leta lekin (uska mansha yeh hai) kay tum mein say aik ka imtehan doosray kay zariyey say ley ley jo log Allah ki raah mein shaheed ker diye jatay hain Allah Taalaa unkay aemaal hergiz zaya na keray ga
